content.rendered:
About This Service

Gamblers Anonymous (GA) is a fellowship of men and women who share their experience, strength and hope with each other that they may solve their common problem and help others to recover from a gambling problem. Individuals can access meeting information for “closed”, “modified closed”, and “open” meetings and hotline information by using a search tool based on city/state or by proximity.

About the Provider

The primary purpose of Gamblers Anonymous is to stop gambling and to help other compulsive gamblers do the same. GA follows a traditional twelve-step pattern. GA is not allied with any sect, denomination, politics, organization or institution.

Other Info

Website: https://www.gamblersanonymous.org/ga/

excerpt.rendered: Support groups for those with a gambling problem
